name: Delicious Grilled Turkey Burgers
author: katquilter
summary: These grilled turkey burgers are super easy to prepare and really moist and delicious!
ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil, or to taste
directions: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate
Combine turkey, red onion, sour cream, mustard, and steak seasoning in a bowl until well mixed
Drizzle with olive oil on both sides and season with salt
Cook on the preheated grill until cooked through, about 5 minutes per side, laying Swiss cheese over burgers just before removing from the grill
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center of the burgers should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
Place burgers on buns and serve
